item.title: The cookies that fueled votes for women
item.description: Suffragists didn't just march. They baked, held bake sales and sold cookbooks to raise money for the cause of equality.

item.title: Voices of experience and hope soar in a song to prevent suicide
item.description: "Hold the Hope" was sparked by one woman's experience as a caregiver to someone who survived suicidal struggles. It started as a poem that has become ...

item.title: Tanning bed users are at higher risk of skin cancer, especially in unusual places
item.description: Indoor tanning is trending among Gen Z. A new study finds tanning bed users not only have a much higher risk of melanoma, they also have DNA damage li...

item.title: At least 12 dead, including 1 gunman, in attack on Jewish holiday event on Sydney's Bondi Beach
item.description: Hundreds had gathered for an event at Bondi Beach called Chanukah by the Sea, which was celebrating the start of the Hanukkah Jewish festival.

item.title: US envoys arrive in Berlin for latest round of Ukraine peace talks with Zelenskyy
